Cicero.ITW David Speer Academy: ITW David Speer Academy (colloquially, Speer Academy) is a public four-year charter high school in the Belmont Cragin neighborhood in Chicago, Illinois. It is a part of the Noble Network of Charter Schools. It is named in memory of David B. Speer, the former Chairman of Illinois Tool Works (ITW), who served the company for 33 years until his death in 2012.
